participant_1.background:
I love the color purple because it reminds me of the beautiful flowers I love so much.
i was diagnosed with autism.
I wish I could write in cursive, but I am a resourceful individual who can adapt to any situation.
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
i enjoy the occasional drink with friends.

participant_2.background:
I try to go for a walk at least three times a week, but it's hard to find the motivation when I'm feeling down.
I'm still adjusting to my new normal, but I'm trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
I played field hockey and soccer with my friends and ate a big cake.
i am an anime fan.
I am doing my best in school, but it is hard to stay focused.

content.text: Hi there! I'm interested in learning more about you.
Hi! What would you like to know?
My favorite animes are Fullmetal Alchemist, Death Note, and My Hero Academia.
I've seen Fullmetal Alchemist and Death Note, but I haven't seen My Hero Academia yet.
I'll check it out. What are some other things you like to do?
I like to play field hockey and soccer. I also like to go for walks.
I used to play field hockey in high school. I miss it.
You should try it again! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to. What do you like to do when you're not playing sports?
I like to watch anime, read manga, and play video games.
I love video games! What do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably League of Legends.
I've never played League of Legends. What's it about?
It's a multiplayer online battle arena game. It's really fun.
I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun
